body:
It seems to me it wouldn’t hurt to use https there. As a matter of fact, http does not work for me, while https does.

@goxberry suggested we could go a bit further and now use archives available on GitHub:
https://github.com/coin-or/Ipopt/archive/releases/x.y.z.tar.gz.
This is also ready to be added to this PR if maintainers (@svigerske? @tkralphs?) agree.
title: Using https instead of http to fetch Ipopt
